content.detailedDescription: On june 20/10, as i've submitted my first 2 photos with my sighting report, & i've overlooked the 3rd photograph on which it shows a strange cloud? cone or triangle like shape in the sky's southern direction. i'm attaching photos, 1st a zoomed in close up & the original photo. time: 1:11:38 pm. by the way this is 3 days before the earthquake we had here.
content.summary: In yet another photo, an odd cone shape in the cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving down lucent blvd heading southto county line rd, i looked to my left towards the mountains/west as i crossed c470 and saw a bright light in the sky over the ken carl area/direction. as i made a left/west on county line rd i got real excited and stopped the car for around 6 seconds and watched the light. it stayed stationary and pulsated from a white-ish blue to nothing to a white then to a light blue to nothing then so on and so forth in that similar pattern. sometimes the blue would show, sometimes it would not and sometimes the blue would flicker. now out here, there is a flight pattern coming from the south west over the rockies heading north east towards dia, and that is the fist thing i check for to see if it is moving like the jets/planes and it stayed still/stationary as i reached santa fe dr.

the positioning of the light was above and to the left of spica and porrima in the virgin constellation and saturn was below and to the right of virgin and the moon and mars were below the horizon. 

as i reached santa fe dr i stopped at the yield sign to see if the light was moving. it was in the same place, not moving, and still pulsating. i turned right/north and immediately contacted a friend who lived north east of county line rd and santa fe dr, which i knew would also have a good view from the back of his house. he confirmed the sighting and described to me what i was seeing as i traveled slower than the speed limit down santa fe keeping an eye on the object when i could. by the time i reached bowles ave the light appeared to be slowly getting smaller/heading straight towards and over the mountains directly west.

it took about three minutes to park the car, run inside, and grab a pair of binoculars. as i ran to a good view point, which took about 2 minutes, i asked my friend who was still on the phone if it was still there and he said it was, so i got off the phone and started to look for the light and it was gone. there were a lot of bright city lights around the intersection, but this light/object was way brighter than the virgin constellation, and i could clearly see the virgin constellation with no problem.

a few days ago the subject came up when i was talking to my friend and he said ethe object was moving west and then what looked like it just dropped out of the sky and disappeared. no explosion, no nothing. the light went out as it dropped and was gone.
content.summary: Bright slow pulsating blue and white light.

content.detailedDescription: 6-22-10 (9:35pm): just like the last time i witnessed strange lights, i was traveling home from granbury, but this time i had my two sons with me. as we reached the top of a hill on fm56, i noticed a very bright, slow moving, circular/round object in the northern sky. due to this road being very dangerous without any safe areas to pullover, i decided to travel to a known location where i could overlook the field of interest where these lights seemed to be orbiting. as i was traveling to this area, each hilltop allowed me to take a quick glance to my right and see this object still illuminating. it took me nearly 5 mins to reach my "lookout point" on star hollow rd and w.D. ct in lipan. when i reached this point i noticed it was very dim, but after a few minutes the same bright light reappeared fully. it was moving west from the weatherford area toward the mineral wells area. from my position the craft was operating 25*-30* above the horizon. weatherford is 25nm from this position and the light was near the 20nm mark from me. of course, this is all based on an educated guess, using an aeronautical sectional map and some simple mathematics. my two sons were so intrigued with the experience we all were sharing and even the 10 yr old said to me, "that's not normal". i agreed and at that point decided i better grab some pictures with my slr camera before this one gets away. i had time to take one picture before it disappeared. within seconds after it vanished i noticed one, maybe two fighter jets traveling very fast toward the area where the lights where located. they traveled toward the mineral wells area, maybe further then i lost site of them. i thought at one point i noticed the ufo reappear out past mineral wells area, but i am unsure what i saw at that point... it was just a flash. my two sons and i began our journey home, another 3 miles or so, and never saw the lights again. the one picture i did capture is pretty interesting to view since i have never taken a picture of anything similar to this before. i feel 100% positive it was not a commercial airliner on approach to dfw or any other airports nearby. like my other sighting, i had to rule out all other possibilities (ifo's) before deciding to submit this sighting to mufon. i still feel this is a government operation of some kind. i called a friend of mine who lives in the area where i feel this occurred and he did say at 10pm or so he heard a helicopter, very low altitude, and a jet of some kind. he actually lives in between weatherford and azle. his conformation of jets/helicopters go hand in hand with the time frame i witnessed the aircraft show up and the ufo disappearing from eyesight. so... here we go again, eyes to the skies!
content.summary: Slow moving roundish object appeared with single bright light and amber glow near milsap, tx.

content.detailedDescription: I pulled my car into the driveway.  next i walked to the front of my house to smoke a cigarette before going in for the night.  upon standing there on the curb, i was looking up at the sky watching the numerous planes fly overhead on their way to/from new york in all likelyhood.  i noticed a ball of light appear over the treeline approaching from the west and traveling east.  at first glance i naturally assumed it was a a headlight on an airliner.  however, i could tell as it inched closer that this light was not accompanied by any tell-tale faa blue and red flashing lights.  in addition, this light was not projecting in front of the object as a headlight would, but rather shining like a star.  i could hear planes flying overhead but noticed this particular object had no discernable audible sound of it's own, nor did it seem to have any actual wings, tale, helicopter blades, engines rotors or any other shape or parts for that matter.  it was just a bright shingin light. in fact, as it flew overhead near the end of the minute to two minute event, a plane flew underneath it at much lower altitude (apparantly coming in for a landing at newark, laguardia or jfk) on a perpendicular path traveling in a southerly direction.  it was quite obvious that these two objects were not similar in any way other than they were both passing overhead at the same particular moment. the object was flying at a relatively low altitude (i would assume 1000-3000 feet) and traveling on a seemingly unnatural perfectly straight path as it disappeared in the night sky over the treeline, into the clouds, on the opposite side of street.  it was way too low in the sky (and it was obviously within the inner atmosphere) to lead me to think it was a cosmic event. i would approximate the speed at a few hundred miles per hour, but let's just say it was traveling slowly enough to watch it for a good one to two full minutes.  while i have seen other things in the sky before on multiple occassions in multiple places, i found this object to be different in that it was just simply there.  i have never submitted anything to mufon before. it didn't seem like it was trying to hide or evade being seen.  if it was, it was doing a poor job.  it almost felt as if it wanted me to see it.  i've lived here my entire life.  long enough to know that what i saw was not a plane, helicopter or any other aircraft i have ever seen. as i stated before.  it had a consistent eminating star like quality (with no tail or trail), had no discernable audible sound that could be specifically attributed to it, and it had no tell-tale flashing faa required lights.  definitely an odd sighting.  i just wish it would have stopped so i could get my packed up camera to capture it on hd video.  sorry i don't have any evidence to provide you.  but i can say this...Planes that fly over new jersey, for the most part, are either coming in for a landing or taking off.  you hear them, you see them and you know what they are.  objects flying into the clouds from the west traveling over manhatten on a path east are on a suspicious path over the atlantic without having made a layover transition either in new jersey or in manhatten.  furthermore a plane on a transatlantic non-stop flight coming from the west would not be dropping to such a low altitude then rising again in a high air traffic are such as this unless it was planning on stopping for gas or switching flights or flight crews. definitely strange.
content.summary: Silent ball of light traveling from west to east at low altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I dreamed of being on a ufo which was in distress. the ship was tilting by the weight of a water solution that seemed to be flowing from one side of the ship to the other and made the ship list from the weight of the water flowing from one side to the other; yet at the same time the water flow threatened to flip the space ship over in mid-air. i thought that maybe the water was used as a coolant for the engine.   the ship was manned by human beings (it appeared.)  i witnessed their view through their windows and saw, off in the horizon on earth, a very specific geographic area of the earth which was covered in ice and snow.

the people onboard the space ship were unsure as to whether this flip of the space ship might not be actually pre-planned as a measure to keep the engines cool during this flight, so they dealt with this dilemma calmly.

yes, this was only a dream.  however, this was quite the unusual dream and very specific.

hope this helps, or opens up some new avenue for discussion on ufo sightings and dreaming....

sincerely,

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Dream event only, but may be significant.

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog out for a walk, palrtly cloudy evening still light outside. across the sky from, north to south. more of a rectagule in shape. at first i thought that it was a baloon of some sort, but there was no string attatched.  it looked hard like metal,non shiny and dark maroon in color. spinning from top to bottom ,towards the south. a constant speed never wavering at all. going a little higher as it moved along. watched this all the time for the total of 10 minutes or more. going higher and higher and still spinning.  no matter how far away it was from me i could still see the object spinning. i fould that quit strange for it went for many miles and i could still see the object rotating.  clouds were passing behind it and you could see though the clouds and still see the object. i finally moved away from the spot that i was at to see if i could see it any further but by the time that i got up past these trees i could not recover the object in my line of sight.   the object passed low in the sky in front of me, i was so mesmorized by it i couldnt take my eyes off of it. i was thinking if i did i would miss out on something happening. i only wish someone else was there to experience this with me.  that wouls have been great.  another thing that i had noticed is that the wind was blowing from south to north, completely oppisite from the way the object was going. prabably from 5 to 10 miles per hour, just a guess.
content.summary: Object going from north to south, rectagule in shape, spinning.

content.detailedDescription: During a memorial day picnic, i was taking photos of kids playing in the yard at dusk. a photo of children taken at 9:09 p.M., a round object is seen above the trees, in a norther direction. at 9:12 p.M. i took a photo of a decorative parachute with air slots, and a more definitive photo of the object is more clearly seen. when downloded an zoomed in on, you can see the size and brightness of the object. other photos show an aircraft that is easily recognized. the bright unknown object, invisible to everyone present, is in stark contrats, to known objects we observe here regularly. attaching series of photos, that i was advised, i should ask marc dantonio at your mufon location, to have a look see. thanks, [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Captured on digital camera, unseen by anyone, until i uploaded photo to my pc.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to las vegas from phoenix on i-93 and a little time after passing nothing, az, me and my girlfriend were looking to the west and saw a stationary reddish orange diamondish looking light under the moon and then disappear, a few seconds later it reappeared with another light and stayed there for about 20 seconds and then disappeared and soon after three more appeared to the left of the moon and one was off to the side and zoomed over to the other three and then all of them disappeared at once and never came back. this all took place within a span of about 2 minutes or so around 12:30 at night.  we have never seen any kind of light or object that looked like this in the sky before.  it was exhilarating and was something we will never forget!
content.summary: 4 reddish orange objects appearing and disappearing in the sky around midnight between nothing, az and wikieup, az

content.detailedDescription:
Taking an afternoon walk with my children, heading west on handley, and saw a "black balloon" in the sky.  the time was approximately 2:40pm cst.  this "balloon figure" was egg/oval shaped at times and then also looked circular.  at first, i thought it was a balloon (although it had not strings attached from it), but then it's shape changed and it kept going higher and higher into the sky (which was clear, except for some light, wispy cirrus clouds).  i couldn't believe a balloon could go so high.  

so, i was trying to point it out to my almost 3 year old daughter, but she didn't see it.  my son is 7 1/2 months and was sleeping.  

the object's path was from south to north.  a helicopter started coming closer to the object and the object stopped and went straight down through some clouds, so it was almost in line with the helicopter.  helicopter continued on it's path and then about 30 seconds later a large airplane crisscrossed the helicopter's path.  by the time the airplane came to where the black object and helicopter had been, i saw the black object start to go north and just disappear.  

i was calm, but hot (was 90+ degrees and humid), before the sighting.  i am always looking in the sky, especially after my 2 previous ufo sightings, which have all happened during the daylight. this object was completely different than my other 2 sightings.  after the object disappeared i starting "seeing black spots that looked just like the object" everywhere i looked.  i rubbed my eyes and saw a few more, then it stopped.  i was not dehydrated, i had just gotten done drinking an entire bottle of water.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a black object that looked similar to a " balloon" going higher and higher in the sky.  as a helicopter approached, it stopped and went near it.  an airplane came shortly after and object went north and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife & i were sitting on the back deck and saw a few airplanes, one in particular caught our attention because it was going so slow ... it was a single engine prop and a local airport does training flights nearby so it is not out of the ordinary to see planes doing stalls etc over our house.
so as we were watching this one plane my wife notices another object and asks me what it is. it was directly overhead, can't determine the altitude, but probably cloud level. it was a long cigar shaped object, about the size of an airliner but possibly bigger. 
what caught our attention was the fact that it made no noise and had no wings that we could see. it made a slow and deliberate path that seemed slower than a plane - moving west to east. 
i thought it might be an illusion due to the lighting with the sun beginning to set, but after a minute or so the object just disappeared like it became one with the sky - that is, there was no burst of speed or anything, all of a sudden it was just gone.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object over washtenaw county.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on the phone and hung up when i finished talking.  i turned around and seen this sphere shaped object come out behind a tree across the street from me and casually gain height diagonally to above treetop level across the street from where it emerged from.  at first sighting i was stunned with my "jaw opened"  when i overcame my being stunned in disbelief of seeing this object, i then became excited.  as it gained altitude i noticed it was not emiting any light and was sphere in shape with flame emiting from the bottom.  the flame appeared to be steady at times for a couple of seconds and then pulsate and was approximately 1/8th inch in length.  from its distance and altitude i am guessing it was aproximately 10 feet in diameter and had a crescent white form at the top.  the object was mainly a dark gray in color.  once above the trees it began an easterly dirction with about a 5 degree northern flight path and its rate of speed was slow around 5 to 10 miles per hour.

i ran upstairs to grab my camera while it was still across the street from me and to tell my nephew (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)to come downstiars not only to see this for himself but to get help with his cell phone.  when we got outside the object appeared as a small dot in the distance and perhaps 3 blocks away. (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)was still able to see the object as i pointed it out to him.  my 35mm camera would not function.  i could not take any pictures of the object until it was no longer visible, it was only then that my camera began to function normally again.
content.summary: Object was just above treetop level emiting flame.

content.detailedDescription:
Moon of memphis ufo

at 10pm around mid-november of 1964 in memphis tennessee, i was asked by my mother to take out the garbage. i went out back and i noticed a bright white full moon above. i looked closer and i noticed it had uniform whiteness with well define circular outline but i was not able to see the shades of white or grey that made the man in the moon face. it was equally as bright as the real full moon, bright enough to create a moon shadow. i looked around and i noticed another moon that was bright orange. this other moon was rising over our neighbor's house to the east, as i looked through the side yard from the back yard to the front. it had the features that created the man in the moon, so i believed that it was the real moon. i looked above and stared again at the white moon for a few minutes, then it made a rapid ascent in the sky. as it rose, it became smaller and smaller until it appeared to looked like a bright star, then a dim star, then disappeared into space. it reminded me of the star of bethleham when it was at high altitude.

i was only seven when i witnessed this ufo that i now call the moon of memphis. i had a good memory of the event so that when i was trained in the air force as a navigator, i was able to analyze the event better with my aviation experience. i estimate that the moon of memphis was at twenty thousand feet and was about ten acres in size. i developed this information from watching the ascent of the moon of memphis through some high cirrus clouds that i estimate was at sixty thousand feet. at twenty thousand feet it would have taken four 747 aircraft parked in a circle to cover the area of the moon of memphis ufo, thus creating a ten acre size estimate. when i saw it above me, it was exactly the size of the real moon when seen high in the sky.

i believe the moon of memphis ufo was a sign from god. when you take a through z and match it with 1 through 26, you can add up the letters of a word and get a sum number. for example israel adds up to 64, which made me think that the 1664 moon of memphis ufo had religious significance. where the moon of memphis came from or how it was created, was certainly a unique phenomenon of divine origin and purpose. it's appearence in 1964 suggest religious intellect.

from voices, visions, and dreams that i experienced thirty three years later, i believe it had a message for humanity. it wanted humanity to be more reverent to all living beings respected more. before animals are killed, they should recieve anathesia and be put into an unwakeable sleep. anything less is cruel, heartless, and unreverent to that being and god. maybe humanity will find a way to eat without killing animals, but until then, we must not kill an animal while it is awake. treat innocent animals as you would like to be treated if you were in their place. the moon of memphis is proof that god does exist and we should obey his wish for us to be more kind to each living being.

[cms/tg/pid]
capt usaf / lt uscg retired
content.summary: Full moon in size, brightness and appearance ascented to be bright star ....

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my garden, warm night clear skies.
i was looking to the south, there is a gap between my house and a large conifer tree.
at 22.25hrs. i noticed a fast moving object, midway between vertical and the horizon.
i walked forward so that i could follow it's progress beyond the conifer, the object was moving west to east.
as i moved forward, some 30 feet, the object was moving fast enough that i had to move quite quickly to keep up.
it was gone out of view quite quickly.
it appeared to be trailing orange fire in, a, stumpy delta way the top part of the delta a little longer than the lower, it made no sound that i could perceive. it only appeared to be two dimensional not three.
my thoughts were that it was a meteor or asteroid passing through the upper atmosphere.
i couldn't see any trail behind the object but it was, by now, getting dark. 
it was difficult to tell how large or small the object was but my perception was that it was quite large.
i am 63 years old and have lived and studied aircraft since i was a lad but i have never seen such an object before, even in farnborough, the cradle of british aviation.
the object dissappeared over the eastern horizon, it passed over in about 15 to 20 seconds.
i'm convinced i spotted something out of the normal, not though, something unnatural.
content.summary: Delta shaped, as if trailling flame.

content.detailedDescription: On sunday 20th june it was a very sunny day and all my family and i were in the garden in prestatyn north wales enjoying fathers day when my dad noticed what looked like a balloon drifting in the sky then we noticed high above that to the right of it what looked like stars round in shape and silver/white across the sky they were in formation 3 in a row up front then 6 in a hextaginal shape behind then differant position behind that very hard to explain in words but they did not move from their positions as they moved across the sky  we carried on watching until they were out of sight. we just looked at each other in be-wilderment as to what we had just seen. i trid to take a phjoto but they were to high and with the sky so blue it would not show them.We have checked local news/ internet but nothing has been reported, 4 days later and we are still talking about it. i hope somebody else sore it.
content.summary: High in the sky in formation about 14 objects star like moving.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at our friend's farm, chilling at night. we were 7 people. the night was really clear and the stars were nice and few. one of my friends was sitting facing the event, and all the time she has been noticing a far away bright star from afar. she didn't pay much attention to it. later we all started dancing and jumping. i went inside the farm house for a bit and everyone was busy laughing. when i walked out of the house, i was facing that star which at that point it got closer (not too close) and bigger. then everyone stood silent watching. it had a bright white flash of light like a diamond, with some little of blue and green dots of light inside that flash. then a cone of light extended from it. it stayed there for like a minute. and then the cone started disappearing and then vanished. 
we stayed there like amazed for a moment. no one thought of getting a camera and recording it because we were so amazed by the light and the cone of light that no one thought about it. it was like a very creepy feeling yet very amusing. we were in a farm that was about 30 minutes away from the city. and there were like open field of olive and other kinds of trees in front of us. so the light couldn't have been from a building. it couldn't have been a plane or anything like it since we didn't hear any noise form engines or anything. and a plane wouldn't just stay there standing in the middle of the air then disappear into no where. it was really weird and we thought about it and we decided that it might be a ufo. since its cone of light disappeared gradually with no trace.
content.summary: A star like object, with a cone of light that disappeared gradually.

content.detailedDescription: Fotograf���a sacada mientras tomaba fotos a un c���mulo que se estaba formando.
content.summary: Objeto con forma de "pájaro".

content.detailedDescription: I am a mufon member and my friend, (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms), is visiting me from reno.  tonight we were outside enjoying the warm weather - i was looking west, trying to focus my binoculars on a jet heading north.  (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)was looking east and saw the following: at first i thought it was a star because it was stationary for about 20 seconds.  then i noticed it was shimmering off the moonlight like an odd type of metallic material.  while tapping my friend's arm, trying to get her attention, the disc horizontally starting moving towards the north.  right about then i got my friend's attention and we both saw the same object take off as in hyperspeed to the north. we both agree the object was about 5 miles from us at an altitude of 5,000'.  given this was my first ufo sighting i felt excitement and goosebumps.
content.summary: Disc streaking horizontally across sky from e to nw.

content.detailedDescription:
The wife and i were on santa rosa island around june 8th 2010. took some pictures and video of the beach stayed 1/2 hour or so, went home.

i'm just now looking at eh photos in further detail and i see things in the sky the sunlight glinting off the body of a huge craft... there are several objects in these 2 pictures .... i see all sorts of what could be spacecraft.... i know it sounds crazy but maybe the angle of the sunset and camera saw the craft... cuz supposedly these ships ive heard about that use clouds to hide their prescence.... take a look and tell me what u think?
content.summary: Beach photos have "anomalies".

content.detailedDescription: As i drove towards abilene, tx, i observed three, metallic spheres that formed a triangle in the daytime sky for near to thirty minutes.
content.summary: 3 shiny, metallic spheres forming triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was relaxing in my friends pool.  i was facing south with my back against the side of the pool.  i was looking at lightening bugs in the backyard and then looked up and noticed a bright egg-shaped light.  it was moving rapidly across the sky in a northeastern direction.  it was gone in less than a minute.  the object did not have any blinking lights and no wings.  i was not sure what to make of it.  after it was gone, i thought i saw something amazing.  my wife and my friends were inside at the time of the event.  there were no witnesses to my knowledge.  i live near an airport and see aircraft everyday.  i have never seen anything like this before.  it was pretty spectacular.
content.summary: I saw a bright white egg shaped light moving rapidly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was relaxing in my friends pool and noticed this light flying towards my direction.  as it got closer, i just saw that it was very bright and it was egg shaped. it was definitely a solid object and pretty high up in the sky.  the object was gone in less than a minute.  i was calm throughout the event.  however, when the event was over, i felt like i saw something amazing.  i live near an airport and i see conventional craft everyday. this was different and i have never seen anything like this.  my friends and wife were inside during this event.  there were no other witnesses that i am aware of.
content.summary: Bright white egg shaped object traveling northwest at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: On vacation in pool in buxton nc outer banks, floating in pool at appox. 10pm-10:40 with kids saw lights coming from south overhead, directly above us we could see 4 round lights in circular pattern red yellow blue and green. jumped outta pool freaked out making family look at it they were all seeing exact same thing as i was. i grew up in va beach va around many jets and different types of planes this is nothing like i have ever seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 round circular lights (red, yellow blue and green ) on bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
We were visiting the golden spike national monument in utah. i took many photographs while at the monumetn.  after we returned home i was going throught the images and noticed that there was something strange in the image i attached.  i checked my camara and lenses to see if it may have been on my equipment but didn't fine any dust or dirt on or in the camara or lense.

i was ask by a friend to enlarge the object in the image, which i did and pasted it back in the image for compairsion.

i have no idea what it is, thought it was cool when i noticed it.
content.summary: .We were visiting the golden spike national monument in utah i took photographs and when we got home i was going through the images and found the image with the object in it.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1am, june 22nd, i walked out to the beach, facing west-southwest toward the olympic penninsula.  i was observing the moon low over the horizon, describing to a friend how to photograph it during the upcoming full moon.
after quite a few minutes, we turned to head back to the house, located opposite where we were standing, to the east-northeast.
i scanned across the sky as i often do, pointing out various constellations to my friend.
looking almost directly overhead, an extremely bright flash appeared suddenly and hovered for a moment.  i looked around to assure myself that it was not a bright star, noted the locations of sirius and saturn, which were two of the brightest objects visible in the sky at the time, and then turned my gaze back upward to directly overhead.
the bright object did not have any flashing lights, but was a solid circular/spherical light.  i have observed many many satellites, the iss, and other celestial objects and know full well the difference between planets/stars/satellites/iss/meteorites/etc.  this was most definitely not any of those types of objects.
the object then began to move quite quickly across the sky to the northeast.  it moved faster than any plane or satellite i've ever seen.  from directly overhead, it traversed to approximately a 45-degree angle from my viewing location in about 30-45 seconds.
the object then slowed, and changed course, moving not along it's original path (which would have tipped me off that perhaps it was the iss or a particularly bright satellite, but no) but suddenly to the direct east - in a horizontal fashion.
it then sped up again, and at this moment, it went from a bright white circular object moving sideways (north to east) to a more elliptical object, which changed in hue and tone form a blue tinge to more of a reddish-orangish and dimmer.  it then started to descend directly down toward the horizon, but then pulsed momentarily in its brightness, and moved directly vertically back up from the horizon.  it paused for a moment, pulsed again, changed hue back to the blue-ish brighter tone/color, and then began descending slowly.
as it descended, it turned again toward a dimmer color.  the last thing i saw prior to it dropping behind the tree-line out of my view was it again getting much brighter.
at its brightest, the object was easily 2-3 times brighter than venus when it's at it's brightest low over the horizon.  i looked around the sky for other stars/objects to compare the brightness to, but could find nothing that was even close - it was many many times brighter and larger in diameter than the brightest object in the sky at the time.  at arm's length, with my hand held out holding my fingers together to try and judge size, it filled a 1cm gap between my fingers.
the entire time it took to traverse the sky was approximately 3-5 minutes.  the first movements from directly overhead to about 45-degrees took 30-45 seconds. the slow movements following this quick initial movement lasted for a few minutes longer in total.
we thought of running into the house to grab a camera, but as it was very very dark there was not likely a good way to capture it, and unfortunately it began to move so fast that we would not have had time before it was gone from our view.
during the entire event, there seemed to be an electrical energy in the air.  no sound in particular, but more of a sensation, not unlike the feeling of static electricity upon one's skin.  both i and my friend had goosebumps over our entire bodies and yet felt a particular warmth despite it being 54f outside at the time.

this is but one of many recent sightings that has occurred and that i have witnessed in the past three weeks.  there have been many more but none so clear as this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely bright fast-moving object traversed sky, moved erratically, slowed, changed course, sped, and descended.

content.detailedDescription: First of all, i am a retired, successful businessman and avid pilot, i have over 1,000 hours as pilot in command, i keep a seaplane at my home on the lake.  my wife and i were out for a sunset cruise in our boat, there wasn't a cloud in the sky,  we were about 1,500 ft west of little barndoor island on lake winnipeasaukee traveling nne, just outside of wolfeboro bay.  we have a bowrider, my wife was in the bow, i was driving and under a bimini.  she looked up and said "what is that",  i stuck my head out from under the bimini to look and directly above us between 20,000 and 50,000 feet(a single bright light is difficult to judge) was an extremely bright light, too large and bright for a star or planet.  i was so intrigued that i went back to the controls and stopped the boat to come out to get a better look. this only took a couple seconds, by the time i got back it was gone.  my wife told me it had moved and pointed in a nne direction.  i spotted it, but now it was a small light with what appeared to be a strobe, at about 50,000 ft, so i immediately thought it was an airplane, but that does not explain how it crossed the entire sky in a blink, with no vapor trail. but as i watched this light it just disappeared, gone, no trace anywhere, completely clear skies. it did occur to me to be the aurora, however, there were no sonic booms and that would not explain an extremely bright light.  this was extremely puzzling and scared my wife.  oddly enough, on the ride home, traveling sse i spotted a red blinking light to the left of the moon, which was about 3/4 full.  i thought it was odd because airplanes will have a white strobe, not red.  again, this caught my attention and i was in a position to study it, and once again, it just vanished.  out in the water, the sky was huge and completely clear, and this light was just gone.
content.summary: Large bright light traveled across sky in a flash and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Last night on june 21, 2010 at 7:40-8:05 i was out for a walk in schuyler county in new york, about 5 miles south/souteast of watkins glen when i noticed a large circular hole formation in the clouds.  the background light made the edge of the circle very distinct, and out of the entire area of the hole hung a gauzy, vaporous mass of stringy clouds.  this vapor converged at a point about the distance of its radius below it. 

the clouds in the sky were fairly low-altitude clouds, and as i was walking along and watching this, i reasoned that it couldn't be a tornado or a whirlwind of some sort, because the strings were not spinning or twisted.  and, it couldn't be rain, because it came to a point like a cone (though not a perfect one) hanging from the clouds.  my first thought was of a report i saw on line recently of probably the same thing where in russia and china people took pictures on their cell phones of a very similar thing (except for these curious stringy vapors reaching down).  

i watched it for my entire walk, which lasted about 25 minutes, and it held it's shape for just about the entire time. as it drifted from west to east, the vapors remained in a funnel shape under the hole, but the point seemed to be trailing off to the west/nortwest direction towards the southern end of seneca lake.  eventually, it started to lose it's consistency and the vapor trail stretched farther and got thinnner, but the spot where it was in the sky did not convert to the same cloud type as those around it, and seems like it was having a hard time filling back in with similar surrounding clouds.

i went in the house and told my wife about it and how it looked like the pictures i'd seen on-line of similar circular clouds.  i'd wanted to get my neighbor to come out and see it, while i was walking past his house, but it looked like he wasn't home, and i didn't want to lose sight of it. i never thought it would happen within a half a mile of my house!  

finally, it wasn't until this morning when i thought that, perhaps the vapors were not drifting down from the hole in the clouds, but being drawn up into it!  the actually didn't seem to descend or ascend, but were quite stationary.  i don't have a cell phone or a digital camera or i might have caught a picture!!!
content.summary: Large circular hole in clouds with vapors forming a cone.

content.detailedDescription:
Moro em porto alegre e comecei a frequentar um municipio vizinho, itapua, que fica na divisa emtre o rio guaiba e a lagoa dos patos, as pessoas me contaram sobre luzes no ceu, mas demonsraram n���o ligar o fato a ovnis, um dia eu meu irm���o e meu cunhado estavamos a noite, na beira da lagoa negra, e o ceu estava nublado, era por volta de onze horas da noite, e o ceu tinha uma aparencia fechado esbranqui���ado de tempo humido, e duas estrelas se faziam viziveis acima de um morro, o morro da grota, famoso por lendas de fantasmas da epoca dos farrapos, pois houveram batalhas no local.
a principio n dei aten������o, apatentemente estavam imoveis, e imaginei que o tempo ia abrir, meu cunhado que ��� nativo me alertou das luzes, e s��� parando e olhando fixamente ��� que v��� que as luzes n ficavam paradas nunca, iam para todos os lados, mas mal dava para ver, de vez em quando elas ficavam mais brilhantes, ou iam se apagando, subiam em zigue-zague na diagonal muito rapido e muito alto, ou faziam circulos enormes, ou iam cainfo como uma folhacaindo da arvore em movimentos suaves, e depois guinava para algum lado rapido e voltava a ficar mexendo devagar eram mais ou menos 5 que acendiam e apagan de vez em quando, essa oi a primeira vez, e a que vi fazerem manobras maiores e mais espetaculares, mas venho vendo quase toda vez que vou na cidade a noite e em lugares diferentes, as vezes varias piscam ao longe enquando uma ou mais ficam perto fazendo manobras loucas, algumas bem perto e mais alaranjadas, ou azulada, ��� dificil dizer as vezes, n s���o avioes ou canhoes de luz pois ja vi um por cima dan���ando baixo em um campo numterreno bem abaixo e longe, essa mudava de cor e parecia ser do tamanho de um carro. mas subia e decia as vezes. queria que alguem com uma boa camera viesse para ver como s���o esses objetos, pois acredito que n���o s���o feitos de luz. 
existe um relato de pouso e avistamento de entidades saindo de um disco na lagoa negra que fica tm itapua, onde vi da primeira vez, no relato eram homens aparentemente humanos de macac���o e cinto largo, ��� um relato antigo e sem provas.
content.summary: Objetos como estrelas dançam no ceu de itapuã com muita frequencia.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i went to enjoy the moon out in a very very large field near my house. we had noticed one or two shooting stars. all of the sudden the sky lights up so brightly that at first i thought it was lightning, and realize that its not because its completely clear. i see an enormous silver object shooting across the sky. things are breaking off of it and the tail is tremendous. its so bright it makes you squint. it was like looking at a flame on a welder. the craziest thing is that about 1 minute later, we heard this very loud boom noise. it was very dull but very very loud. and we both were said it unison "it crashed!". not sure if it was a satellite or a meteor but it definately crashed somewhere nearby. just wondering if anyone could have saw the same thing.
content.summary: Enormous crashing ball of silvery light.

content.detailedDescription: Was trying to get to sleep and staring out the window. it was dark out but the sun was almost coming up. all of a sudden something in the sky started emmiting a very bright light. the object appeared to be dark surrounded by bright white light. i am not sure how far away it was. partialy obstructed by some leaves at the top of a tree. the light was turning some of the leaves white. it remained still the whole time. no sound. i was startled enough to grab for my camera but when i did that the light disappeared. only lasted about 5-8 seconds.
content.summary: Bright white glow appeared in sky, made some leaves at the top of a tree look white. possibly dark object in center, remained still.

content.detailedDescription: I listen to all of the civil and military aircraft frequencies for ufo reports. for 30 years i have never heard nothing but while driving home to e texas from shreveport la. about a week and a half ago my receiver locked up on 124.575 or 128.575 "will confirm frequency later" and a pilot was talking about "something that was glowing". he told fwc that "about 5 aircraft had reported it on the last frequency". then some pilot made some type of crazy comment that i didnt understand. then a pilot made the " twilight zone" diddle over his mic.  i never heard nothing else.  im sure that you know how to find this stuff out with the air traffic control centers. im sure it was a dfw controller that was routing high altitude traffic and not a local shreveport la. controller. please let me know what or if you find out anything regarding this matter. im retiring in sept. and will be taking a field investigater course if one is needed in my area. i reside in e texas about 20 miles from shreveport la. but have property about 30 miles n of shreveport near plain dealing la . i am all over e texas and nw la. and would like a large area if possible. im so heavy into ufo's that im designing a type of camera system to watch the skies at all angles plus have a rotateable camera with zoom lens also. my cameras will be recording constantly where i can review the skies at any time. im a ham radio operator and have a dedicated 180 ft tower just for this system. right now im looking at whats available. i also want to purchase a professional cam corder to have with me while traveling. the dept store cameras wont do. im sorry for being late reporting this to you , but im sure theres a log regarding this incident somewhere at dfw .  thanks ,   *wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Aircraft reporting ufo to fort worth center atcc.
